block.p: The obituary of Cardinal John O'Connor yesterday referred imprecisely to a comment about him from Frances Kissling, president of Catholics for a Free Choice, which supports legalized abortion. It was in a Vanity Fair article in 1990 that she said the cardinal was ''the kind of man who, if the church still had the power to burn people at the stake, would be right there lighting a fire.'' She did not say it during his illness or after his death.
